name: Mantra Crown Towers

reviews.text: We recently stayed at this amazing resort a family of 6 and a small baby. This resort was fantastic with everything you could posssibly need location security a gorgeous apartment with breathtaking views, Pools to die for with lovely indoor heated pool, sauna steam room aswell as the main pool was fantastic with a kids area complete with pirate ship. The foyer was lovely. It also has a fantastic Thai restaurant with scrumptious food, aswell as a cafe and restaraunt with bar for cocktails. The staff were lovely and this was a great break for us with beautiful accomodation we will definately be back to Crown Towers excellent
reviews.title: excellent resort

reviews.text: I recently stayed at the crown towers resort surfers paradise. I booked through Mantra and was made to pay in full two weeks prior to my stay and was told it was a 4 1/2 star resort???? I was not happy at all the we were put on the 2nd level with no view apart from the noisy highway (After I requested a high floor with a ocean view) the staff were not helpful at trying to move us. The unit it self for very old dryer and dishwasher did not work properly and the TV were ancient no digital TV at all and with two small children was rather annoying as there was no ABC kids when we questioned the staff we were told that the whole building needs and up grade and they won't do it. i will never stay there of with MANTRA ever again!!!
reviews.title: was meant to be a 4 1/2 star resort

reviews.text: We stayed for 2 weeks with our 5 children, the 3 bedroom apartment was very spacious & comfortable. We were on the 33rd floor & had a view of the ocean from the main bedroom & the canal from the kitchen/lounge. The kids had a ball in all 3 pools, especially the pool with the pirate ship, the whole resort is just beautiful! We had dinner twice at the thai Resturant & twice at the other Resturant, both were fantastic! Will definately stay again. The only negative opinion I have is that the apartment could do with a refurbishment!
reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic place to stay with kids!!!

reviews.text: As avid Gold Coast fans we have been holidaying there for many years. We have stayed at Mantra Crown Towers at least 5 times, each time loving it more than the last. We got home from a 16 day stay yesterday (9th Nov 2011) and we had a blast. This was our first holiday with our 21 month old son and we were not disappointed. I'd been liaising with Tammy from Reception constantly regarding questions, our requests and needs - all of which were met and expectations exceeded! I was most impressed by her exceptional service.
reviews.title: Best holiday ever!

reviews.text: Our apartment was amazing - truly stunning, with great views and a high level of cleanliness. The hotel pool provided countless hours of amusement for our little boy and all in all we had the best holiday ever. And that's saying something considering we have been all over Europe and the Pacific Islands...
reviews.title: Great Place to Relax and Enjoy Yourself!

reviews.text: Mantra you need to review this property and the standards and if this is an indication of what their properties are like I would recommend that no-one stays there.
reviews.title: This place is a dump

reviews.text: We stayed in room 803 for 3 nights from the 8th to 11th of October 2011 and could not get out of the place quick enough
reviews.title: Best Resort I have stayed in!!!

reviews.text: The room was dirty dust on the cupboards the lounge was old and dirty
reviews.title: Wow - What a great kids place

reviews.text: The bed quilt was dirty had stains that you can only imagine where they came from, at least it got changed
reviews.title: Shabby and outdated - try QT over the road instead.

reviews.text: The toaster did not work and when we tried to use it the power shorted out the room
reviews.title: Great family orientated resort

reviews.text: location is excellent. Close to Cavill ave and easy access to all theme parks. Fantastic pools for the kids and good thai restuarant. our room was tired and could do with a update. Ou view was great and we were kept amused by the adventure park next door. hire car business x 2 just out the door so always easy when we wanted a hire car. would go back.
reviews.title: well located

reviews.text: Stayed in a 1 bedroom apartment on the 11Th floor with my girlfriend for around a week. Some points to note;
reviews.title: Worthwhile

reviews.text: Pros: staff were very friendly on arrival, and allowed us to store our bags as our room wasn't ready until 2. Reception is nice and pool is fantastc. Location is great for busses with a stop 30sec walk from he hotel for theme parks. Decent walk to the main area but we didn't mind that. Rooms serviced mid stay.
reviews.title: Awesome resort with the best pools!

reviews.text: Cons: some aspects of the room weren't great. Carpet needs a professional cleaning, and one lamp shade had an unbelievable stain I can only imagine was alcohol induced. Had to contact reception to get tv operating. The most frustrating thing was that I could not fit under the shower head. I'm 6ft. Seems small but after a cold day, was keen on a nice hot shower.
reviews.title: Crown Towers Resort

reviews.text: Overall great place and I'll be back.
reviews.title: awesome

reviews.text: We had previously stayed in a private apartment in the same building and loved it. For this visit we booked a Mantra 2 bedroom apartment. The facilities in the hotel are very good, as everyone says a very good outdoor and indoor pool area with spa/sauna, and a functional gym. The hotel is locate 1 block from the beach and 10 minutes walk to the centre of Surfers - close to the action but far enough to be quiet at night. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Our room was clean and spacious but rather dated and could do with a renovation.
reviews.title: Great location and facilities but tired rooms

reviews.text: Firstly, this place has an amazing pool. If it were not for the pool, it would have nothing! The renovated rooms you see on the website do not exist, yet anyway. The room you do stay in is tired and unclean with stained carpet and a bad smell. This is the 2nd time I have stayed here because I looked at the website an saw MANTRA had taken over an the rooms and that it had been renovated. Renovation has not taken place, nothing has changed since my last stay 3 years ago. Reception staff are unfriendly and give u barely any information at all at check in. The property has an amazing Thai restaurant and day spa and all day cafe, so u think they would promote this and give u information about opening hours, menu etc. There is nothing in your room, like a welcome book with hotel information etc nothing to make u feel welcome. After bringing this to the managers attention and getting nothing but being made to feel like an idiot, From previous experience the first thing I did was air the appartment out, and wipe everything down with my own spray an wipe disinfectant. They give u one sachets of washing liquid so I can understand why all the dishes needed cleaning before use as people would not go and buy their own. House keeping must have forgot to turn the dishwasher on whilst cleaning as we walked into our room with a load of other people's dishes packed in the dishwasher that were unwashed. Then I had to clean the dishwasher filter myself as it was clogged with food. I went to vacuum the dirty carpet to find the vacuum had no bag in it??? There is no dust pan an brush and the broom was broken. Mop pad is ripped an barely useable. The balcony was filthy, with the plastic sun bed needing a good scrub. Not to mention the cigarette butts littered everywhere an a homemade "bong" stuffed behind the air con. Just not good enough. After I cleaned everything and told myself just to get over it, we had a really good time. But I can understand why the rooms are as they are because if they do not provide guests with sufficient cleaning utensils etc how are they meant to keep their room clean during their stay, as daily house keeping does not exist. If this resort was managed properly, it has the potential to be the absolute best!!!
reviews.title: Such a shame.....

reviews.text: This hotel has a very confused personality.
reviews.title: What star rating?

reviews.text: Firstly we travel with 2 kids 6 and 4. So whats important to us, may be different to others.
reviews.title: Room needs good clean but resort great except for cold pool area

reviews.text: The pools are fantastic. if you have kids you will understand that this probably forgives a lot of sins.
reviews.title: Good location, the best pool, apartments not maintained well

description: The Crown Towers Resort is consistently in demand all throughout the year. Discerning Gold Coast visitors appreciate all the luxuries that the Crown Towers Resort can offer. The Crown Towers Resort in Gold coast have it all, position, all the amenities you could wish for to make your Gold Coast holiday your best ever.
